title: Can no longer play back tunnel circuit logs in current docker image

content.raw:
Using the `osrf/subt-virtual-testbed` docker image, I can no longer play back CloudSim logs from the tunnel circuit, using `ign gazebo -v 4 -r --playback <log_dir>`. Logs from the urban circuit appear to be working. With the tunnel circuit logs, I just see a white screen in the Gazebo window, and no errors are present in the console. I also tried the `log_playback.sdf` file with the same behavior.

I can play back tunnel circuit logs fine using an older docker image.
content.html:
Using the osrf/subt-virtual-testbed docker image, I can no longer play back CloudSim logs from the tunnel circuit, using ign gazebo -v 4 -r --playback <log_dir>. Logs from the urban circuit appear to be working. With the tunnel circuit logs, I just see a white screen in the Gazebo window, and no errors are present in the console. I also tried the log_playback.sdf file with the same behavior.

I can play back tunnel circuit logs fine using an older docker image.
